message.entry: MTIMES (*) is not fully supported for integer classes. At least one argument must be scalar.
MTIMES (*) is not supported for one sparse argument and one single argument.

Arguments must be 2-dimensional, or at least one argument must be scalar. Use TIMES (.*) for elementwise multiplication, use PAGEMTIMES to apply matrix multiplication to the pages of N-D arrays, or use TENSORPROD to find a product between two N-D arrays.
Both logical arguments must be scalar. To operate on each element of the matrix individually, use TIMES (.*) for elementwise multiplication.
